message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item not only stands as a testament to quality but also comes with a unique feature that we believe could greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the unparalleled excellence of our product at an exclusive rate. Let's make this deal happen!
